text: Bountiful Summer () is a 1951 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Boris Barnet.Прощание с актрисой Ниной Архиповой пройдет 27 апреля в театре СатирыЩедрое лето (1950) It stars Nina Arkhipova, Nikolay Kryuchkov, and Viktor Dobrovolsky. ==Actors== * Nina Arkhipova as Vera Groshko * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Nazar Protsenko * Viktor Dobrovolsky as Ruban * Marina Bebutova as Oksana Podpruzhenko * Anton Dunajsky as Prokopchuk * Georgi Gumilevsky as Musi Antonovich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1951 comedy movies Category:1951 drama movies Category:1950s comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: Bountiful Summer
